Title: Alien Resurrection
Overview: Two hundred years after Lt. Ripley died, a group of scientists clone her, hoping to breed the ultimate weapon. But the new Ripley is full of surprises … as are the new aliens. Ripley must team with a band of smugglers to keep the creatures from reaching Earth.
Keywords: android, mercenary, dystopia, sequel, alien, betrayal, impalement, cloning, scientist, flamethrower, disembowelment, smuggler, gene manipulation, man in wheelchair, breeding, genetic engineering, regeneration, xenomorph, alien queen, explosive decompression, swimming underwater
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Brandywine Productions
Cast: Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder, Brad Dourif
